fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use a Mafia ability each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have one charge of each Mafia role that is not in the game.

- When you use a charge of another Mafia role, you may use any ability that role has, but may only use that ability one time.

- You do not have charges of Mafia Head roles, Mafia Espionage roles, the Mafioso, or the Musician's serenade ability.

- You may change yourself into any Mafia role that you still have the charge of on any night.
